bug.author: universewill
bug.description:
i create color images as numpy array. However, the colors got blurred on the edges when use st.image to show in browser. Here is the image showing on browser: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6790730/72607536-e1b89900-395b-11ea-9fbe-fb5b8779daf9.png></denchmark-link>
Here is the real image: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6790730/72607660-14fb2800-395c-11ea-9d9b-0ff6716baae8.png></denchmark-link>
